attributes.action: Hold a General Election when Tony Blair stands down
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We voted in Labour in the knowledge that Tony Blair was the leader and so would become Prime Minister. GIVE US THE RIGHT TO CHOOSE our Prime Minister when he stands down - HOLD A GENERAL ELECTION - it is our right!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
